title: Halberd of Vigilance
content: Halberd of Vigilance Very Rare 9~18 Damage 1d10 +2 Slashing+1d4 Force Sentinel Weapon: Gain a +1 bonus to initiative rolls and Advantage on Perception Ability Checks. Adroit Reflexes: When you make an Attack Roll as a reaction, you make it with Advantage. Weapon Enchantment +2 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: A variant of this halberd's design was thrown out in the early stages of development by its forgemaster.
